services.name: Shopify Theme Development

faqs.question: How long have you been working with Shopify and Figma?
faqs.answer: I've been working with Shopify for over 3 years, building 28+ stores across various industries. My Figma experience spans 4 years with 65+ projects completed, including design systems, mobile apps, and web applications.

faqs.question: Can you migrate my existing store to Shopify?
faqs.answer: Yes! I can migrate your store from platforms like WooCommerce, Magento, BigCommerce, or custom solutions. This includes transferring products, customers, orders, and maintaining SEO rankings. Migration projects typically take 2-4 weeks depending on store size.

faqs.question: Do you build custom Shopify apps?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I develop both private and public Shopify apps using Node.js and React. This includes product customizers, subscription systems, custom dashboards, and third-party integrations. Custom apps start at $1,000 and take 2-12 weeks depending on complexity.

faqs.question: What's included in a design system?
faqs.answer: A complete design system includes 200+ UI components with variants, typography scales, color systems (with dark/light modes), icon libraries (300+ icons), auto-layout implementation, responsive breakpoints, interactive prototypes, and comprehensive documentation. Delivery typically takes 4-10 weeks.

faqs.question: Can you design both web and mobile apps?
faqs.answer: Yes! I design for all platforms including web applications, iOS apps, Android apps, and responsive websites. My designs are created with development handoff in mind, including proper component naming, constraints, and developer-friendly specifications.

faqs.question: What are your rates?
faqs.answer: Rates vary by project complexity. Shopify theme customization starts at $500, custom themes at $1,500, and apps at $1,000. Figma design systems start at $800, UI/UX design at $600. I offer project-based pricing with clear deliverables and timelines. Contact me for a detailed quote.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes! For projects over $1,000, I offer flexible payment plans: typically 50% upfront, 30% mid-project, and 20% on completion. For larger projects ($5,000+), we can arrange custom payment schedules.

faqs.question: What's your typical project workflow?
faqs.answer: My workflow includes: 1) Discovery call to understand requirements, 2) Detailed proposal with timeline and pricing, 3) Contract signing and deposit, 4) Regular updates with milestone deliveries, 5) Testing and revisions, 6) Final delivery and handover, 7) Post-launch support (30-90 days depending on project).

faqs.question: How often do you provide updates?
faqs.answer: I provide updates at key milestones and maintain open communication throughout the project. For most projects, you'll receive progress updates 2-3 times per week. I use tools like Slack, Email, and Zoom for communication and collaboration.

faqs.question: How many revisions are included?
faqs.answer: Standard packages include 2-3 rounds of revisions per milestone. This covers reasonable adjustments and refinements. Major scope changes are discussed separately. I aim for satisfaction within the agreed-upon scope while maintaining project timelines.

faqs.question: What technologies do you work with?
faqs.answer: For Shopify: Liquid, JavaScript, React, Node.js, GraphQL, REST APIs. For design: Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, Illustrator. For development: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React, Redux, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Git, AWS. Full tech stack available in my portfolio.

faqs.question: Do you handle Shopify app integrations?
faqs.answer: Yes! I integrate popular Shopify apps like Klaviyo, Yotpo, Judge.me, ReCharge, Algolia, and many others. I can also build custom integrations with third-party services via APIs. Integration projects typically take 1-2 weeks.

faqs.question: Can you optimize my store's performance?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I specialize in Shopify performance optimization including image optimization, lazy loading, code minification, app audit, and theme cleanup. I've achieved 95+ PageSpeed scores for clients. Optimization projects take 1-2 weeks and start at $400.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
faqs.answer: Yes! All projects include 30-90 days of post-launch support (depending on project size). After that, I offer monthly maintenance packages starting at $200/month covering updates, bug fixes, minor changes, and ongoing optimization.

faqs.question: What if I need changes after the project is complete?
faqs.answer: Changes within the support period are handled at no extra cost. After the support period, I offer hourly rates ($75/hour) or monthly retainers for ongoing updates and maintenance. Major feature additions are quoted separately.

faqs.question: What's your current availability?
faqs.answer: I'm currently accepting new projects! My typical booking schedule is 1-2 weeks out for new projects. For urgent projects, I offer expedited service (50% rush fee). Contact me to discuss your timeline and I'll let you know if I can accommodate.

faqs.question: What time zones do you work in?
faqs.answer: I'm based in Kenya (EAT, UTC+3) but work with clients globally. I adjust my schedule to accommodate different time zones and offer flexible communication hours. Most clients in US, EU, and Asia have found scheduling convenient.

faqs.question: Do you work with agencies and other developers?
faqs.answer: Yes! I regularly partner with agencies, design studios, and development teams as a Shopify/Figma specialist. I can work as part of your team on a project basis or ongoing retainer. White-label services available upon request.

faqs.question: Can you work with my existing design/development team?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! I'm experienced collaborating with cross-functional teams. I can integrate seamlessly with your designers, developers, product managers, and marketers. I use tools like Figma, Slack, Jira, Trello, and GitHub for collaboration.

faqs.question: How do I get started working with you?
faqs.answer: Simple! 1) Contact me via email (shaddihmaina15@gmail.com) or LinkedIn with your project details, 2) We'll schedule a free 30-minute discovery call, 3) I'll provide a detailed proposal with timeline and pricing, 4) Once approved, we'll sign a contract and kick off the project. Looking forward to working together!
